snippet.title: Super Mario Sunshine Multiplayer - Concept Trailer
snippet.description:
An in depth glimpse of what it’d be like if Super Mario Sunshine featured multiplayer. 

During this project, I ensured the quality of its concept, though I wasn’t able to assess total console compatibility and overall performance due to unnecessary time constraints. This project was created and distributed by Founder of Blastsoft Studios, Michael Luaces. 

For copyright purposes, a download link will not be provided, as I do not condone nor support piracy in any fashion. Please support the wonderful world of Nintendo by purchasing their products. Thank you for your continued interest.
